name: The Fabulous Fantastical Food Factory
description:
A very strange game where aliens have harnessed all of your very small planet's resources towards making food for them. You must appease your new Alien Overlords by beaming food to their spaceship from your very small planet via an advanced electromagnetic railgun.

CONTROLS:

Hold grip and trigger to interact with menu/spawn food

Hold grip to grab and release food

It is a buggy, unfinished and rushed game I know, but it is my first actally published VR game. I have not tested the Windows build since my pc is not VR ready.
